thread.title: Top Class London Black Cab Tours - London Christmas Windows and Lights Tours - Private Guided Tours.
thread.title_full: Top Class London Black Cab Tours - London Christmas Windows and Lights Tours - Private Guided Tours.

author: Dominic Grantham
title: Top Class London Black Cab Tours - London Christmas Windows and Lights Tours - Private Guided Tours.
text:
London Private Guided Tours - Professional Guide - 3 Hour Tour - Up to 5 People Per London Cab. 1 2 3
Your London Cabby Guide will collect you from your preferred pickup location, in the comfort of your Black London Cab will show you the very best that London has to offer!
We commence with iconic Harrods whose windows are renowned the world over, passing by Kensington Palace on our way to see Winter Wonderland at Hyde Park and then Marylebone High Street. We travel next to Oxford Street where the shops all have a Christmas theme, followed by Regent Street, who traditionally have their own Christmas show. Piccadilly Circus, Trafalgar Square where Norway donates the tree every year. The Ritz and Buckingham Palace.
Our extended version of this tour also visits The City, Bow Lane, Bank Junction, The superb Leadenhall Market and is completed at Tower with Tower Bridge.
Details of the exact tour may vary as London Christmas Lights are switched on at different dates. However, the main London lights are in place by 16th November.
Price £184.95 Price per cab – Up to 5 people per cab - A group of 5 that's a 3 hour private tour that works out at only £36.99 Per Person
